pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Build time environment variables
LIRI_SESSION_CURSOR_THEME - Sets the default cursor theme. (Theme names can be found in /usr/share/icons.)
To change the default cursor theme do:
ln -sf gentoo /usr/share/cursors/xorg-x11/default ln -sf /usr/share/icons/Paper /usr/share/cursors/xorg-x11/default
(Cursor themes only work with X [via xcb] or with eglfs.)
To run a Liri session in X do: startx open terminal program liri-session
liri-session will not work with .xinitrc.
To run a Liri session in EGL fullscreen do:
sudo gpasswd -a USERNAME input liri-session -- -platform eglfs
To run a Liri session in Wayland with Weston do:
sudo emerge -1vuDN weston[desktop,drm,fullscreen,gles2,seatd] export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/tmp/xdg-runtime-$(id -u) weston --shell=fullscreen-shell.so open terminal program QT_WAYLAND_SHELL_INTEGRATION=fullscreen-shell liri-session -- -platform wayland
To run a Liri session in Wayland with dwl do:
export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/tmp/xdg-runtime-$(id -u) dwl -s "liri-session -- -platform wayland"
